```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
# library(geojsonio)
library(broom)

```

```{r}
# yearly <- file.choose()
# yearly_data <- read_csv(yearly)
 
full <- file.choose()
full_data <- read_csv(full)

sa3_geo_data <- st_as_sf(st_read("data/SA3/SA3_2021_AUST_GDA2020.shp"))
 
joint_data <- as_tibble(merge(full_data, sa3_geo_data, by.x = "SA3_NAME_2011", by.y = "SA3_NAME21"))
class(joint_data)
```

```{r}
library(maps)
us <- st_as_sf(map("state", plot = FALSE, fill = TRUE))
us_tbl <- as_tibble(us)

ggplot(joint_data) + 
  geom_sf()
```
